Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: often times I am asking/receiving feedback in different ways - from using genAI i am usually using it to check my grammar and to help reduce my word count, whereas from a teacher it is the actual substance of my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
